desc.keira: She appear if she not die before.

desc.zoltan: It will only appear if Zoltan was spoken to during the '__quest__' quest.

desc.bastion: Once young witchers trained here. Now the bastion is a forgotten ruin.
desc.ironMine: Iron ore was once extracted from this place for use in the Wolf School's forges.
desc.kaerMorhen: The keep of the Sea of Yore, home to the witchers of the Wolf School.
desc.lakesideHut: A dozen years ago a hermit lived here who brewed excellent mead. The witchers would visit him from time to time and chat about far-off lands.
desc.ruinedWatchtower: This lakeside watchtower was once the pride of the Wolf School witchers, yet today lies in ruins, the only sound the wind whistling past its stones.
